src:
Likvidacija v prestolnici: pri bencinski mu je morilec kroglo poslal v glavo
Žrtev je zloglasni Ljubomir Marković.
02 Nov 2019, 12:16 by A. L.
BEOGRAD – V Ulici Grčića Milenka v Beogradu so včeraj zvečer ubili Ljubomirja Markovića (klicali so ga Kića), ki je dobro znan v navijaških krogih pa tudi v beograjskem podzemlju. Sloves je staknil po vodenju zloglasne Partizanove podružnice »Alkatraz«, javnost pa ga je pobliže spoznala, ko je bil pred leti obsojen v primeru uboja francoskega navijača.Najprej so mu dosodili 30 let zapora, po pritožbi pa je bila kazen skrajšana na 13 let. Pred kratkim naj bi se vrnil na ulice Beograda, kjer pa ga je nekdo pričakal. Marković naj bi storilcu poskušal ubežati k bencinskemu servisu, a ga je ta med begom ustrelil, zaradi česar se je zgrudil. Morilec je nato prišel do njega in ga ustrelil še v glavo.V lovu na Markovića naj bi bilo izstreljenih osem nabojev, storilca pa še niso prijeli.
text:
Capital Liquidation: At a gas station, a killer sent him a bullet to the head
The victim is the infamous Ljubomir Markovic.
02 Nov 2019, 12:16 by A.L.
BELGRADE - Ljubomir Markovic (nicknamed Kic) was killed in Milicko Grcic Street in Belgrade last night, who is well known in fan circles as well as in the Belgrade underground. He became famous after running the infamous Partizan branch of "Alcatraz", and the public came to know him more closely when he was convicted years ago of killing a French fan. He was supposed to return to the streets of Belgrade recently, where someone was waiting for him. Markovic allegedly tried to escape to the gas station, but was shot by the perpetrator while on the run, causing him to collapse. The killer then approached him and shot him in the head. Eight bullets were allegedly fired in the Markovic hunt and the perpetrators were not yet captured.
